content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'Tan pronto como':

content.stimulus_en: As soon as I (finish) ________, I'll come.
Don't forget to call me when you (be) ________ ready.
I'll wait until he (come) ________.
After I (work) ________, I usually go to the gym.
Before you (go) ________, please close the window.
I'll call you when I (arrive) ________.
Please turn off the lights before you leave.
I'll in stay the office until I finish the report.
When I have some free time, I like to read books.
I'll you send the email as soon as I get home.
Call me as soon as you have any news.
We'll the start meeting when everyone is here.
A future or related word for Tan pronto como is '________'.
